main event: An unidentified flying object was sighted in Columbus, Kansas on January 8, 1967.
interesting points: The observer noted the object was whitish-blue and elliptical in shape with red, white, and blue flashing lights., The sighting lasted for about 5 minutes and the object was reported to be traveling toward the northern horizon., A high-pitched whining sound was heard during the observation., At the time of the sighting, 5-6 aircraft were confirmed to be making bomb runs in the area., There was no physical evidence or photographs collected of the sighting.
